Nicola Elizabeth Formby (amụrụ n' ọnwa Eprel n'afọ1965) bụ onye odeakụkọ nke mba South Afirika, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na onye ndụmọdụ nri, onye bụbu onye nlere anya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
Amụrụ na mba South Afrịka n'afọ1965,  Formby chetara na mgbe ọ na-etolite n'ebe ahụ "nkịta bi n'ụlọ ezumike n'èzí, ọ dịghịkwa mgbe ọ bụla ha ji aka apịtị abata n'ụlọ"
Ọ bịara England wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Wellington College, Berkshire
N'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, David Bailey sere ya foto maka mkpuchi magazine ma kwuo na ọ chetara ya Julie Christie
Nke a dugara n'ịrụ ọrụ nṅomi maka Clairol na Wella na mgbasa ozi TV na Jamini
Bido na ime ihe ngosi, Formby gara n'ihu pụta na ihe nkiri Ben Elton The Man from Auntie n'afọ (1990)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ndu nke Diana, Princess of Wales, na ihe nkiri telivishọn awa atọ The Women of Windsor n'afọ  (1992), banyere ndụ Diana na Sarah Ferguson
Ọ pụtakwara na usoro telivishọn Bugs na The All New Alexei Sayle Show n'afọ (1995)
N'ịbanye n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ, Formby ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Tatler  ma bụrụkwa onye ndụmọdụ nri maka Pret a Manger na Itsu

Site n'afọ1995 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na n'afọ 2016, Formby bụ onye mmekọ nke AA Gill, onye edemede na onye na-akatọ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke Sunday Times, bụ onye hapụrụ nwunye ya Amber Rudd maka ya na na ogidi ya kpọrọ ya "Blonde"
Ha mukọrọ ejima, otu nwoke na otu nwanyị, nke  a mụrụ n'afọ 2007
Michael Bywater dere banyere ha "Ya na Nicola Formby bụ Ike Di na Nwunye, nke anyị kpọrọ asị, ka ọ bụ n' anyị akpọghị?"

Esemokwu dị n'etiti Gill na Piers Morgan nwere ike ịmalite mgbe Morgan kọwara Formby dị ka nwamba nwoke na-enwe mmekọahụ nke alụlụ oge kparala ha aka ọjọọ  wee kwuo na ya gosiri ya "ihe nkiri ọtọ" n'onwe ya
Gill kwuru na Morgan mere nke a wee kpọọ ya "onye na-ekwupụta onwe ya nke na-adịghị mma"

Akwụkwọ nke Contemporary Quotes nke afọ(1997) gụnyere abụọ sitere na Formby, gụnyekwara na "Ha na-atụkarị ụjọ - nwa agbọghọ mara mma bụ nnukwu trofi na ha na-enweta akwara tupu egwuregwu ma ha amaghị ihe ha ga-eme gị."
